sentences.sentence: She was just about to apologize when he pre-empted her.
sentences.translation: 她正想道歉，他却抢先说了。

sentences.sentence: The scheduled programme will be pre-empted by a special news bulletin.
sentences.translation: 预先安排好的节目将临时换成特别新闻简报。

sentences.sentence: But Google pre-empted its rivals last winter and bought a defensive stake in AOL.
sentences.translation: 但Google去年冬天就比对手先行一步，从AOL那里买下了一些防卫性的股份。
